Body: Description: System volume is currently at 73% utilization and we're having trouble reducing that.  We've already offloaded all log archives older than 3 months but we're unable to identify anything else that we can safely offload to free up space.  File Shadows would be the next best thing to offload but currently we have no way to properly identify which ones are safe to be removed.  Any assistance would be appreciated.
What We've Learned Updated: We asked for customer approval to access the backend of the server.

What We've Learned Updated: We asked for customer approval to access the backend of the server.

We have cleared the system partition occupied by inodes and journals.
Next Steps Updated: Waiting for the customer to confirm.
